en.welcome: Hello! I am Holdstation AI Assistant. How can I help you with your trading today?
en.live_support_msg: Thank you. Our Support team has received your request. We will respond shortly.

options.answer: To withdraw, ensure all Positions are closed and you have enough ETH for zkSync gas fees. Average processing time is 1-5 minutes.
Liquidation occurs when Margin Ratio drops below maintenance level (80-100%). In volatile markets, always set a Stoploss!
Holdstation offers the lowest fees on zkSync: 0.05% for open/close. Funding fees are calculated hourly based on Long/Short skew.
Simple steps: 1. Deposit ETH/USDC -> 2. Select Pair -> 3. Leverage -> 4. Long/Short. Read Docs.
Support team is online. Please describe your issue in detail.
